sage.input: import random seed=input('enter the last three digits of your student id number.')

random.seed(seed) n=random.randint(3, 34) r=input('If a planar graph has 35 vertices, 75 edges and '+str(n)+' connected components, how many regions does it divide the plane into?') if r==41+n: print('correct!') else: print('No, the number of regions is '+str(41+n)+'.')
